title: [1.6.4][ssp/smp][原生中文]Thermal Expansion热力膨胀v3.0.0.7[永久更新][SW]
author: Darkyoooooo
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Darkyoooooo 于 2014-6-28 09:58 编辑 

Thermal Expansion正式版 
作者团队:CoFH   官方网站&Wiki:http://teamcofh.com/由于本站搬运者SF_Chipan长久未更新 而TE3已经更新正式版 所以我新开了个帖暂替更新!Thermal Expansion(热力膨胀)是当今许多服务器都会使用的科技Mod之一 曾被称作:用MJ能量的IC2TE3大改 已经不再依赖BuildCraft 其能源系统已经被替代为自带的RF能源(10RF=1MJ)
截图:



新版TE3新手指南(闪耀之灵):http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-215353-1-1.html

下载地址:
安装方法:两个Jar文件都拖到mods里
Minecraft 1.6.4
v3.0.0.7Mod本体 | Mod核心
v3.0.0.6
Mod本体 | Mod核心

关于Mod安装:
什么 你以为你把两个Mod拖到mods就算成功安装了?不对!  这货第一次启动时会下载两个东西!
如果无法下载就会出现大红叉 然后无法启动游戏! 所以我给这些无法下载的人搬运了这两个文件!用法:下载后直接将zip里的两个文件拖入modsFor Thermal Expansion v3.0.0.x
百度云 | Dropbox
更新记录:
v3.0.0.5Random Bug Fixes

v3.0.0.2 - 1/2/2014 - Happy New Year!Bugfix: Cyclic Assembler is less crashy when given troll recipes designed to crash it. (Who does that?!) Bugfix: Fluiduct filters work for forced injection blocks now. Bugfix: Incredibly rare Itemduct corner case crashes have been resolved. Bugfix: Pulverizer Wool recipe has been fixed. Bugfix: Redstone Furnace should now handle legacy-style items properly. Bugfix: Tinker's Alloy Blend is now properly craftable with dusts.

v3.0.0.1 - 12/28/2013Optimized a few things.

v3.0.0.0 - 12/25/2013 - Merry Christmas!Okay, so everything has been completely redone here. A normal changelog doesn't suffice.MJ is no longer supported by Thermal Expansion. The new energy system is Redstone Flux. (RF). Ratio is 10:1 RF:MJ.Lots of mods already support Redstone Flux - it is now the most widely adopted energy system in modded Minecraft!

Darkyoooooo 发表于 2013-12-28 09:57

这货管的可宽了...加了个捡起物品右下角提示/HUD, 自动转换各mod矿物, 高清皮肤披风, 额外社交系统, 看起来还有世界生成的什么东西...
HUD那个我在TE的irc上问都没人知道, cofh页面也没写不知道为啥偷偷开发这么好用的特性= =
